9 An Individual Contributor is defined as an employee who does not have any direct reports. 
10 A Manager is defined as an employee having one or more direct reports,  
who is not a Senior Leader. 
11 A Senior Leader is defined as an employee with the title of director or above  
who is two reporting lines from corporate leadership.
